properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 31 at 2:34AM PST until February 1 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 11 to 13 feet at 14 seconds. For
the Gale Warning, south winds around 25 kt with gusts up to 35
kt and seas 12 to 17 feet at 13 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10
NM and Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Gale Warning, from 4 PM this afternoon to 7
AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST SATURDAY
